attributes.action: we would ask the govenrment to hold a revote on brexit
attributes.additional_details: my refrecnes are my people family friends associates and people whom dont even like me share the same opinion that we need to remain part of europe part of a great and diverse multicultural society and contienent our economy has already been affected and we havnt even left the eu yet. i am of a european decent as are many of my friends and even the ones who are not European are of one mind we need to remain Britain is great so let us stay great !
attributes.background:
the voice of all British people young and old needs to be heard. 
we as one people need to unite and make a difference that benifits us all. 
leaving the eu was never about actually leaving, everyone just wanted to oust Cameron from office and end the tieriny of the tory party
